Ability Shield: Holder's Ability cannot be changed by any effect.
Air Balloon: Holder is immune to Ground-type attacks. Pops when holder is hit.
Assault Vest: Holder's Sp. Def is 1.5x, but it can only select damaging moves.
Berserk Gene: (Gen 2) On switch-in, raises holder's Attack by 2 and confuses it. Single use.
Big Root: Holder gains 1.3x HP from draining/Aqua Ring/Ingrain/Leech Seed/Strength Sap.
Binding Band: Holder's partial-trapping moves deal 1/6 max HP per turn instead of 1/8.
Blunder Policy: If the holder misses due to accuracy, its Speed is raised by 2 stages. Single use.
Bright Powder: The accuracy of attacks against the holder is 0.9x.
Choice Band: Holder's Attack is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
Choice Scarf: Holder's Speed is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
Choice Specs: Holder's Sp. Atk is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
Covert Cloak: Holder is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.
Damp Rock: Holder's use of Rain Dance lasts 8 turns instead of 5.
Destiny Knot: If holder becomes infatuated, the other Pokemon also becomes infatuated.
Eject Button: If holder survives a hit, it immediately switches out to a chosen ally. Single use.
Eject Pack: If the holder's stat stages are lowered, it switches to a chosen ally. Single use.
Expert Belt: Holder's attacks that are super effective against the target do 1.2x damage.
Flame Orb: At the end of every turn, this item attempts to burn the holder.
Focus Band: Holder has a 10% chance to survive an attack that would KO it with 1 HP.
Focus Sash: If holder's HP is full, will survive an attack that would KO it with 1 HP. Single use.
Grip Claw: Holder's partial-trapping moves always last 7 turns.
Heat Rock: Holder's use of Sunny Day lasts 8 turns instead of 5.
Heavy-Duty Boots: When switching in, the holder is unaffected by hazards on its side of the field.
Icy Rock: Holder's use of Hail lasts 8 turns instead of 5.
Iron Ball: Holder is grounded, Speed halved. If Flying type, takes neutral Ground damage.
King's Rock: Holder's attacks without a chance to make the target flinch gain a 10% chance to make the target flinch. Evolves Poliwhirl into Politoed and Slowpoke into Slowking when traded.
Lagging Tail: Holder moves last in its priority bracket.
Lax Incense: The accuracy of attacks against the holder is 0.9x.
Leek: If held by a Farfetchâ€™d or Sirfetchâ€™d, its critical hit ratio is raised by 2 stages.
Life Orb: Holder's attacks do 1.3x damage, and it loses 1/10 its max HP after the attack.
Light Clay: Holder's use of Aurora Veil, Light Screen, or Reflect lasts 8 turns instead of 5.
Lucky Punch: If held by a Chansey, its critical hit ratio is raised by 2 stages.
Macho Brace: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.
Mental Herb: Cures holder of Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, Torment. Single use.
Mirror Herb: When an opposing Pokemon raises a stat stage, the holder copies it. Single use.
Power Herb: Holder's two-turn moves complete in one turn (except Sky Drop). Single use.
Protective Pads: Holder's moves are protected from adverse contact effects, except Pickpocket.
Quick Claw: Each turn, holder has a 20% chance to move first in its priority bracket.
Razor Claw: Holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage. Evolves Sneasel into Weavile when held and leveled up during the night.
Razor Fang: Holder's attacks without a chance to make the target flinch gain a 10% chance to make the target flinch. Evolves Gligar into Gliscor when held and leveled up during the night.
Red Card: If holder survives a hit, attacker is forced to switch to a random ally. Single use.
Ring Target: The holder's type immunities granted solely by its typing are negated.
Rocky Helmet: If holder is hit by a contact move, the attacker loses 1/6 of its max HP.
Room Service: If Trick Room is active, the holder's Speed is lowered by 1 stage. Single use.
Safety Goggles: Holder is immune to powder moves and damage from Sandstorm or Hail.
Scope Lens: Holder's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.
Shed Shell: Holder may switch out even when trapped by another Pokemon, or by Ingrain.
Smooth Rock: Holder's use of Sandstorm lasts 8 turns instead of 5.
Sticky Barb: Each turn, holder loses 1/8 max HP. An attacker making contact can receive it.
Terrain Extender: Holder's use of Electric/Grassy/Misty/Psychic Terrain lasts 8 turns instead of 5.
Throat Spray: Raises holder's Special Attack by 1 stage after it uses a sound move. Single use.
Toxic Orb: At the end of every turn, this item attempts to badly poison the holder.
Utility Umbrella: The holder ignores rain- and sun-based effects. Damage and accuracy calculations from attacks used by the holder are affected by rain and sun, but not attacks used against the holder.
White Herb: Restores all lowered stat stages to 0 when one is less than 0. Single use.
Wide Lens: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is 1.1x.
Zoom Lens: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is 1.2x if it moves after its target.

Category:Power_items.Power Anklet: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.
Category:Power_items.Power Band: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.
Category:Power_items.Power Belt: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.
Category:Power_items.Power Bracer: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.
Category:Power_items.Power Lens: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.
Category:Power_items.Power Weight: Holder's Speed is halved. The Klutz Ability does not ignore this effect.

Category:Stat-increasing_items.Assault Vest: Holder's Sp. Def is 1.5x, but it can only select damaging moves.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Choice Band: Holder's Attack is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Choice Scarf: Holder's Speed is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Choice Specs: Holder's Sp. Atk is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Deep Sea Scale: If held by a Clamperl, its Sp. Def is doubled. Evolves Clamperl into Gorebyss when traded.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Deep Sea Tooth: If held by a Clamperl, its Sp. Atk is doubled. Evolves Clamperl into Huntail when traded.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Eviolite: If holder's species can evolve, its Defense and Sp. Def are 1.5x.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Light Ball: If held by a Pikachu, its Attack and Sp. Atk are doubled.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Metal Powder: If held by a Ditto that hasn't Transformed, its Defense is doubled.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Quick Powder: If held by a Ditto that hasn't Transformed, its Speed is doubled.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Soul Dew: If held by a Latias/Latios, its Dragon- and Psychic-type moves have 1.2x power.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Thick Club: If held by a Cubone or a Marowak, its Attack is doubled.
Category:Stat-increasing_items.Wide Lens: The accuracy of attacks by the holder is 1.1x.

Category:Choice_items.Choice Band: Holder's Attack is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
Category:Choice_items.Choice Scarf: Holder's Speed is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
Category:Choice_items.Choice Specs: Holder's Sp. Atk is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.

Category:Stat-raising_held_items.Absorb Bulb: Raises holder's Sp. Atk by 1 stage if hit by a Water-type attack. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_held_items.Adrenaline Orb: Raises holder's Speed by 1 stage if it gets affected by Intimidate. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_held_items.Cell Battery: Raises holder's Attack by 1 if hit by an Electric-type attack. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_held_items.Luminous Moss: Raises holder's Sp. Def by 1 stage if hit by a Water-type attack. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_held_items.Snowball: Raises holder's Attack by 1 if hit by an Ice-type attack. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_held_items.Weakness Policy: If holder is hit super effectively, raises Attack, Sp. Atk by 2 stages. Single use.

Category:Stat-raising_Berries.Apicot Berry: Raises holder's Sp. Def by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_Berries.Ganlon Berry: Raises holder's Defense by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_Berries.Kee Berry: Raises holder's Defense by 1 stage after it is hit by a physical attack. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_Berries.Lansat Berry: Holder gains the Focus Energy effect when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_Berries.Liechi Berry: Raises holder's Attack by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_Berries.Maranga Berry: Raises holder's Sp. Def by 1 stage after it is hit by a special attack. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_Berries.Petaya Berry: Raises holder's Sp. Atk by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_Berries.Salac Berry: Raises holder's Speed by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.
Category:Stat-raising_Berries.Starf Berry: Raises a random stat by 2 when at 1/4 max HP or less (not acc/eva). Single use.

Category:Terrain_seeds.Electric Seed: If the terrain is Electric Terrain, raises holder's Defense by 1 stage. Single use.

Category:Species-specific_Z-Crystals.Decidium Z: If held by a Decidueye with Spirit Shackle, it can use Sinister Arrow Raid.
Category:Species-specific_Z-Crystals.Eevium Z: If held by an Eevee with Last Resort, it can use Extreme Evoboost.
Category:Species-specific_Z-Crystals.Incinium Z: If held by an Incineroar with Darkest Lariat, it can use Malicious Moonsault.
